body.section: If you log in to a mail-server with a self-issued certificate (may happen with mailbox-protocol "POP3 (SSL)" or "IMAP (SSL)" only) yawebmail will ask you to check the details of the given certificate.

section.name: The input
section.p:
"yes"-button:
Push the "yes"-button if you trust the given certificate.

"no"-button:
Push the "no"-button if you do not trust the given certificate. You will get back to the login-screen.
